shortdesc.ph: Used to configure video subscription options.
Used to configure video subscription options.

plentry.pd: The type of video stream you want to subscribe to. See . The default value is VIDEO_STREAM_HIGH, which subscribes to a high-quality video stream.

Whether to subscribe only to encoded video frames:
: Subscribe only to encoded video data (structured data); the SDK does not decode or render raw video data.
: (default) Subscribe to both raw and encoded video data.
The type of video stream to subscribe to. Default is REMOTE_VIDEO_STREAM_HIGH, which means subscribing to the high-quality stream. See REMOTE_VIDEO_STREAM_TYPE.

Whether to subscribe only to encoded video frames:
: Subscribe only to encoded video data (structured data). The SDK does not decode or render raw video data.
: Subscribe to both raw and encoded video data (default).
